turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order pizzas from the new pizzeria called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like two.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Both of them should be small.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! what kind of toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On one of them, I want pepperoni and sausage. And then on the other, I want bacon and olives.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I want extra cheese on both.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure. extra cheese will be $2.50 per pizza, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of crust would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make it Make them both a thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, just the extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so 2 small pizzas. one with pepperoni and sausage. the other with bacon and olives. extra cheese and thin crust on both. correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $25 plus tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bye.
